metadata.dc:author: Moreno, R
Martín González, M
García Laraña, J
Alonso, M L
Allegue, F
Ledo, A
metadata.dc:description: This case report describes the simultaneous occurrence of antiphospholipid antibody syndrome in a patient with cutaneous T-cell lymphoma. An abnormal T cell-B cell cooperation is postulated to explain this unusual association. To the best of our knowledge, no similar cases have been reported previously.
metadata.dc:title: Síndrome antifosfolípidos en un paciente con linfoma cutáneo de células T.
[Antiphospholipid syndrome in a patient with T-cell skin lymphoma].
